data.title: Katy Perry Archives
data.meta_description: Katy Perry is a singer and TV personality who’s known for her songs “I Kissed a Girl,” “Teenage Dream,” “Firework,” “Roar,” “Dark Horse,” and more.
data.text:
Thanks, I Hate It

Luke Bryan Is ‘Sitting Back and Waiting’ to See If He’s Returning to ‘American Idol’

Fans want to know who's replacing Katy Perry on 'American Idol.' And they also want to know if Lionel Richie and Luke Bryan are returning. Here's what Bryan said.

Celebrity

Jennifer Lopez Said ‘American Idol’ Proved She Was a Nice Person

Jennifer Lopez said people didn't seem to understand her. She shared how her role as a judge on 'American Idol' changed this.

Thanks, I Hate It

‘American Idol’ Fans React to Season 22 Winner Abi Carter: ‘Most Talented Singer in Years’

Abi Carter, who received a Platinum Ticket from the ‘American Idol’ judges after her audition, was named the season 22 winner after a three-hour long finale.

Music

Katy Perry’s ‘Woman’s World’ Is a Terrible Disappointment

Katy Perry's "Woman's World" could have been the comeback of the century. Instead, the "Firework" singer might have just destroyed the remnants of her career.

Celebrity

Katy Perry Said Lorne Michaels Paid Her the Ultimate Compliment After an ‘SNL’ Appearance

Katy Perry said she grew to really like Lorne Michaels when she hosted 'SNL.' A compliment he paid her helped.

Music

The Writer of ‘Teenage Dream’ Gave It to Katy Perry So She Could Afford Hot Water

"Teenage Dream" is arguably Katy Perry's signature song. One of the writers did not want to hand the track over to Perry, but she had to because she was desperate.

Music

Katy Perry Said People Saw Her as ‘Damaged Goods’ Early in Her Career

Katy Perry released her debut album in 2001. She shared why no record label wanted her after she released it.

Celebrity

Katy Perry Said She Wants People to ‘Stay the F*** Away’ From Her in Public

Katy Perry finds it inexcusable when people approach her in her free time. She shared what frustrates her about fame.

Music

The Writer of Katy Perry’s ‘Firework’ Tells All

Katy Perry's "Firework" was co-written by one of the most important songwriters working in the business today. She revealed what it was like to work with the "California Gurls" singer.

Celebrity

Katy Perry Rolled Her Eyes at 1 of Elvis Presley’s Rules About Fame

Katy Perry said she wants people to leave her alone when she's in public. This put her at odds with one of Elvis Presley's rules about fame.

Celebrity

Katy Perry Allegedly Lost 20 Pounds Without Ozempic Amid Speculation

Katy Perry recently dropped 20 pounds -- and she allegedly didn't use weight-loss drugs to aid her despite public speculation. Here's what sources are saying.

Music

Katy Perry’s ‘Firework’ Was Written by a Movie Star

Katy Perry's "Firework" is perhaps the most ubiquitous Fourth of July anthem of modern times. Interestingly, it was co-written by a movie star who appeared in a popular movie trilogy.

Celebrity

Katy Perry Looked ‘Unnatural and Worried’ at Paris Fashion Week, Fashion Psychologist Says

A fashion psychologist said that Katy Perry looked 'nervous' and 'unsure' as she attended Paris Fashion Week in June 2024. Here's what they noticed.

Celebrity

Katy Perry Steps Out in Bold Nearly-Topless Look But Covers C-Section Scar: See Photos

Katy Perry's Paris Fashion Week looks are bolder than ever in 2024. Here's the nearly-topless look she went for and how it covered her scars.

Music

Katy Perry Isn’t the 1st Pop Star to Release a Song Called ‘Woman’s World’

Katy Perry has announced that she's putting out a new song called "Woman's World." Here's a look at Perry's interesting relationship with feminism.

Celebrity

‘American Idol’: Katy Perry Reinforces Her Icon Status With Powerful ‘What Makes a Woman’ Performance

Katy Perry is a pop music icon, but she remained low key in the music scene during her time on ‘American Idol. Her latest performance re-solidified her icon status.

Celebrity

Katy Perry and Orlando Bloom’s Engagement Is ‘Fragile,’ Psychologist Says: ‘Marriage Might Be Too Complex’

Katy Perry and Orlando Bloom have yet to tie the knot despite their long engagement. Here's what a psychologist said about where they're at.

Thanks, I Hate It

‘American Idol’: ‘The Bachelor’ Star Juan Pablo Galavis Explains Flirty Exchange With Katy Perry

Was 'The Bachelor' star Juan Pablo Galavis flirting with Katy Perry on 'American Idol' Season 22? Here's what he said about the exchange.

Celebrity

Katy Perry Teases ‘Top Secret’ Album With $5,000 Glass Mini Handbag

Katy Perry showed off a 'top secret' note in a glass handbag worth nearly $5,000. Here's what she wrote on a note.

Celebrity

Orlando Bloom Leaves Thirsty Comment on Katy Perry’s Look After Insider Claims They ‘Stopped Putting in Effort’

Is Orlando Bloom and Katy Perry's marriage on the rocks? Here's what an insider said before Bloom commented on Perry's latest mesh look.

Entertainment

Katy Perry Replied With 7 Words to Her Viral King Charles Coronation Seat Moment

'Don't worry guys,' Katy Perry began a tweet after being spotted trying to locate her seat inside Westminster Abbey for King Charles III's coronation on May 6.

Music

Why The Beatles’ ‘All You Need Is Love’ Is Inferior to Katy Perry’s

Katy Perry recorded The Beatles' "All You Need Is Love" in a coffee shop acoustic style that suits the song.

Royal family

Katy Perry ‘Wild’ About Windsor Castle Stay Ahead of King Charles’ Coronation

King Charles III will celebrate his coronation on May 6, 2023, and Katy Perry will be a key performer at the festivities.
